title: Content
homepage-1:
Hi there!

I'm Will, a young-adult fantasy writer from Australia.

My first novel, **Finn: Red Shadow**, is available on [Amazon](https://amazon.com/), [Booktopia](https://booktopia.com/), and other places that sell books.
